argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drngui.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | drngui.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | drngui.r | |- R e. DivRing |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_isdrng | |- ( R e. DivRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ ( Unit ` R ) = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_mpbi | |- ( R e. Ring /\ ( Unit ` R ) = ( B \ { .0. } ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simpri | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( B \ { .0. } ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( B \ { .0. } ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
